text: In the early morning of 18 September 2022, 27 people were killed and 20 injured in a bus crash in Sandu Shui Autonomous County, Qiannan Prefecture, Guizhou, People's Republic of China (PRC). The bus was transporting 47 people to a quarantine facility during the COVID-19 pandemic in China. The accident happened at 2:40 a.m. ==References== Category:2021 disasters in Asia Category:2020s disasters in China Category:September 2022 events Category:Transport disasters in Asia Category:Guizhou
title: 2022 Guizhou bus crash
